text: is the name of a Japanese artificial satellite which was put into orbit. Denpa was a radiation experiments satellite (REXS).Gunter's Space Page, REXS (Denpa); retrieved 2012-4-2. The launch was a project of the Institute of Space and Astronautical Science of the University of Tokyo. The satellite was sent into orbit on February 19, 1972.JAXA, "Catalogue of ISAS Missions" ; retrieved 2012-4-2. == References == == Other websites == * Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA), Denpa (REXS) mission profile Category:Japanese satellites Category:Spacecraft launched in the 1970s
title: Denpa (satellite)
